Title: Kendasampige
Actors: Prakash Belawadi, Chandrashekar, Manvitha Harish, Rajesh Nataranga
Plot: When a love story goes awry, two young lovers are forced to take to the road with the police hot on their heels. They escape across Karnataka in a roller-coaster ride that is at once enthralling, exasperating and nail-biting.
